Award.AwardTitle: Discover Engineering Teleconference for Middle and High School Students: Feb. 23, 2000

Division.LongName: Div Of Engineering Education and Centers

Award.AbstractNarration: This award provides funding for the support of the 2000 National Engineers Week Teleconference for Middle and High School Students. The eleventh annual Discover Engineering! Teleconference entitled, "Engineers Turning Ideas into Reality," will be broadcast nationwide during National Engineers Week on Wednesday, February 23, 2000. The purpose of this teleconference is two-fold. First, the program provides U.S. middle and high school students and their teachers with an interesting insight into the work and career opportunities of engineers in a novel teleconference setting. Second, the Discover Engineering! telecast serves as the centerpiece of community open houses at many industrial, government and college locations.
